attributes.action: Increase State pension from basic rate proportionally to Income Tax and National Insurance contributions paid over working life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Persons having reasonably good salaries can pay more in income tax and national insurance annually than many low paid staff earn but, will still only receive the same State pension as the lower paid will.  This is inequitable and I feel that the pension one receives should fairly reflect higher amounts paid in - as it would in a defined contribution scheme.
